welcome.p1: Welcome to my website! My name is Eugene Ohvatuk (nickname SBV) and I've been doing web development for more than a year. My main technology stack is React. I try to create web applications that are beautiful, easy to use and as efficient as possible.
welcome.p2: On this website I present my work and experiments in web development. Here you can read about my projects and learn more about how I work.
welcome.p3: Be assured that no personal information is collected on my site. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me by email ohvatuki@gmail.com.
welcome.p4: Thanks for visiting my site, I hope you find a lot of interesting things here!
